com.travelportal.dao.impl

Class UserDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.travelportal.dao.impl.UserDao
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IUserDao

    public class UserDao
extends Object
implements IUserDao
    DAO class to manage all the DB related operations for a user like registration, login, profile update, history etc.
    Author:
    naveen.kumar
